about_the_game:
DFD Demo – A Short, Intense Preview of the Action

This is the gameplay prototype for Don’t Fall Down, a co-op hero shooter where you and your team fight through relentless waves of deadly machines. Developed by a single creator in just three months, this demo is an early look at the game's combat, hero abilities, and core mechanics.

What’s Included in This Demo?

🔹 Three Playable Heroes – Choose from Soldier, Crunch, or Asle, each with unique abilities and playstyles.
🔹 Challenging Enemy Waves – Battle against a mechanized army, including elite units that will push your team to the limit.
🔹 Tactical Combat – Use hero abilities, movement, and teamwork to survive the ever-growing swarm.
🔹 Objective-Based Gameplay – Search for the Bull Mech, hidden within the desert castle, and interact with it to initiate extraction.

Constant Updates & Development

  • This demo will be continuously updated, with improvements to gameplay, balance, and performance.

  • Expect bug fixes, gameplay refinements, and future content updates as development progresses.

  • Your feedback is highly valuable in shaping the future of the game!

Important Notes

  • This is a prototype demo focused on gameplay mechanics, not a full game.

  • Some features are still in early development, so expect rough edges and ongoing improvements.

Gear up, drop in, and experience the fight—this is just the beginning.

name: DontFallDown Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 11
  • Processor: 13th Gen Intel i5-13600K
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4080 RTX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: A Co-op Hero Shooter with Intense PVE Action. Inspired by L4D, Darktide, Helldivers 2, Overwatch. Choose your hero, team up, and fight through relentless waves of machines. Stay out of The Watcher’s sight. Survive. Escape. Grow stronger. Reclaim what belongs to humanity. Gameplay Prototype.
